# physicalSize

**Instance Property**

The size, in meters, of a reference image in the real world.

## Declaration

```swift
var physicalSize: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

For example, set the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ReferenceImage/physicalSize] of a reference image of a yard stick to `0.9144` meters.

## Inspecting a reference image

- **name**: The name of a reference image.
- **resourceGroupName**: A string value the represents the name of the resource group the framework loads an image from.
- **description**: A textual representation of this reference image.
